alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Marion; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 9:08PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN GREENE...SOUTHERN FAYETTE...MONONGALIA...TUCKER...PRESTON AND EASTERN MARION COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM EDT... At 908 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Westover, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morgantown, Fairmont, Westover, Kingwood, Star City, Parsons, Terra Alta, Davis, Thomas, Rowlesburg, Pleasant Valley, and Winfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 68 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 31. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 1. Interstate 79 in West Virginia between mile markers 130 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southwestern Pennsylvania...and northern and northeastern West Virginia.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Marion; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker
